skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine ¨C U-557.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm U-557, Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine... I went on four sorties during the war, sinking six merchant ships plus Galatea. The day after I sank her, an allied ship mistook me for a Royal Navy ship and collided with me... I had a few accidents before that too, so maybe I'm just cursed with bad luck...
skins.acquisition: Type VIIC submarine, U-557, reporting in. I'm a bad luck magnet, so feel free to forget about and ignore me... As far as missions go... I'll give them my best shot.
skins.login: Commander, nothing bad happened to you before you got here, right?
skins.details: Pennies are said to bring good luck, so I saved a bunch in my piggybank... but that didn't seem to do much for me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've only heard about "The First Fun Time" from my predecessors... I wasn't around for it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: When you're a bad luck magnet, you probably shouldn't get close to people. That way, you won't cause them trouble...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'll try to be the best secretary I can. It's the one thing... I don't want to fail at...
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it, Commander...? Wait, don't tell me... I've messed up again...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What... was that... It felt weird...
